array.string: Increases total Presence by 3% and all healing done by 1%.
Increases total Presence by 6% and all healing done by 2%.
Increases the Force critical chance by 1%.
Increases the Force critical chance by 2%.
Increases the Force critical chance by 3%.
Reduces the activation time of Deliverance by 0.25 seconds.
Reduces the activation time of Deliverance by 0.5 seconds.
Increases the damage and healing of area effect abilities by 5%.
Increases the damage and healing of area effect abilities by 10%.
Reduces the pushback suffered while activating healing abilities by 25% and lowers the threat generated by healing abilities by 5%.
Reduces the pushback suffered while activating healing abilities by 50% and lowers the threat generated by healing abilities by 10%.
Reduces the pushback suffered while activating healing abilities by 75% and lowers the threat generated by healing abilities by 15%.
Reduces the Force cost of Force Armor by 15 and reduces the cooldown of Force Armor by 1.5 seconds.
Reduces the Force cost of Force Armor by 30 and reduces the cooldown of Force Armor by 3 seconds.
Reduces the health spent by Noble Sacrifice by 1%.
Reduces the health spent by Noble Sacrifice by 2%.
Immediately heals a target for a 9, plus an additional ? over ? seconds.

Rejuvenate has a 50% chance to grant Conveyance, which increases the effect of your next healing ability: Benevolence: Force cost reduced by 50%. Deliverance: Activation time reduced by 1 second. Healing Trance: Critical chance increased by 25%. Salvation: Force cost reduced by 30%.

Rejuvenate has a 100% chance to grant Conveyance, which increases the effect of your next healing ability: Benevolence: Force cost reduced by 50%. Deliverance: Activation time reduced by 1 second. Healing Trance: Critical chance increased by 25%. Salvation: Force cost reduced by 30%.
Force Armor increases the target's movement speed by 10% for 3 seconds.
Force Armor increases the target's movement speed by 20% for 6 seconds.

Increases the duration of Rejuvenate by 3 seconds. In addition, Rejuvenate has a 50% chance to apply the Force Shelter effect to its targets, increasing armor rating by 10% for the duration of Rejuvenate.

Increases the duration of Rejuvenate by 6 seconds. In addition, Rejuvenate has a 100% chance to apply the Force Shelter effect to its targets, increasing armor rating by 10% for the duration of Rejuvenate.
Lowers the Force cost of Restoration by 15. In addition, Restoration now removes negative physical effects and heals the target for ?.
Increases your Force critical hit chance by 1% and reduces all damage taken by 1%.
Increases your Force critical hit chance by 2% and reduces all damage taken by 2%.
Heals a target for ? immediately and a further ? per second for 3 seconds.
Targets affected by your Weaken Mind are slowed by 10% for its duration.
Targets affected by your Weaken Mind are slowed by 20% for its duration.
Increases your bonus healing by 2% and chance to hit with all abilities by 1%
Increases your bonus healing by 4% and chance to hit with all abilities by 2%
Increases your bonus healing by 6% and chance to hit with all abilities by 3%
Healing Trance critical hits have a ?% chance to make the next Noble Sacrifice activate without degenerating Force and without spending any health.
Healing Trance critical hits have a ?% chance to make the next Noble Sacrifice activate without degenerating Force and without spending any health.
Heals all allies within 8 meters of the targeted area. Targets remaining in the area heal for an additional ? over ? seconds.
Increases the damage dealt by Disturbance, Mind Crush, Telekinetic Wave and Turbulence by 2%.
Increases the damage dealt by Disturbance, Mind Crush, Telekinetic Wave and Turbulence by 4%.
Increases the damage dealt by Disturbance, Mind Crush, Telekinetic Wave and Turbulence by 6%.
Reduces the Force cost of Force attacks and healing abilities by 3%.
Reduces the Force cost of Force attacks and healing abilities by 6%.
Reduces the Force cost of Force attacks and healing abilities by 9%.
Increases the amount absorbed by your Force Armor by 10%.
Increases the amount absorbed by your Force Armor by 20%.

Reduces the pushback suffered while activating Disturbance, Telekinetic Wave and Turbulence by 35%. In addition, Disturbance has a 50% chance to increase your Force regeneration rate by 10% for 10 seconds. Stacks up to 3 times.

Reduces the pushback suffered while activating Disturbance, Telekinetic Wave and Turbulence by 70%. In addition, Disturbance has a 100% chance to increase your Force regeneration rate by 10% for 10 seconds. Stacks up to 3 times.
Increases the duration of Weaken Mind by ? seconds.
Increases the duration of Weaken Mind by ? seconds.
Increases the maximum range of Disturbance, Telekinetic Wave and Turbulence by 5 meters.
Force Wave has a 50% chance to unbalance its targets, immobilizing them for 5 seconds. Damage dealt after 2 seconds ends the effect prematurely.
Force Wave has a 100% chance to unbalance its targets, immobilizing them for 5 seconds. Damage dealt after 2 seconds ends the effect prematurely.

Weaken Mind critical hits have a 50% chance to grant Psychic Projection, causing your next Telekinetic Throw to channel and tick twice as fast. This effect cannot occur more than once every 10 seconds.

Weaken Mind critical hits have a 100% chance to grant Psychic Projection, causing your next Telekinetic Throw to channel and tick twice as fast. This effect cannot occur more than once every 10 seconds.
Sends a wave of telekinetic energy that deals (current weapon) kinetic damage to up to 5 targets within 8 meters of the primary target.
Lowers the cooldown of Force Lift by 7.5 seconds and increases the lockout duration of Mind Snap by 1 seconds.
Lowers the cooldown of Force Lift by 15 seconds and increases the lockout duration of Mind Snap by 2 seconds.
Your Force Armor has a 50% chance to explode in a concussive wave when it ends, incapacitating all nearby enemies for 3 seconds. Damage causes this effect to end prematurely.
Your Force Armor has a 100% chance to explode in a concussive wave when it ends, incapacitating all nearby enemies for 3 seconds. Damage causes this effect to end prematurely.

Force attacks that critically hit have a 50% chance to grant Telekinetic Effusion, lowering the Force cost of your next two Force abilities by 50%. Additionally reduces the cooldown of Force Speed by 5 seconds.

Force attacks that critically hit have a 100% chance to grant Telekinetic Effusion, lowering the Force cost of your next two Force abilities by 50%. Additionally reduces the cooldown of Force Speed by 10 seconds.

Your Disturbance has a 30% chance and your Forcequake has a 10% chance when dealing damage to grant Tidal Force, immediately finishing the cooldown on Telekinetic Wave and reducing the activation time of your next Telekinetic Wave by 100%. This effect cannot occur more than once every 10 seconds.
When you activate Disturbance or Telekinetic Wave, there is a 10% chance the ability will produce a second attack that strikes the same targets for 30% damage.
When you activate Disturbance or Telekinetic Wave, there is a 20% chance the ability will produce a second attack that strikes the same targets for 30% damage.
When you activate Disturbance or Telekinetic Wave, there is a 30% chance the ability will produce a second attack that strikes the same targets for 30% damage.
Your Telekinetic Momentum causes tremors that increase your Force bonus damage by 1% for 30 seconds. Stacks up to 3 times.
Increases the critical damage bonus of your Weaken Mind, Telekinetic Wave and Turbulence by 10%.
Increases the critical damage bonus of your Weaken Mind, Telekinetic Wave and Turbulence by 20%.
Increases the critical damage bonus of your Weaken Mind, Telekinetic Wave and Turbulence by 30%.
Increases the critical damage bonus of your Weaken Mind, Telekinetic Wave and Turbulence by 40%.
Increases the critical damage bonus of your Weaken Mind, Telekinetic Wave and Turbulence by 50%.
Deals (current weapon) internal damage to a single target. Turbulence automatically critically hits targets affected by your Weaken Mind.
Increases the damage dealt by Telekinetic Throw by 4%.
Increases the damage dealt by Telekinetic Throw by 8%.
Increases the damage dealt by Telekinetic Throw by 12%.
Increases the critical chance of Telekinetic Throw and Disturbance by 5%.
Increases the critical chance of Telekinetic Throw and Disturbance by 10%.
Causes your periodic damaging abilities that critically hit to restore 0.5% of your total health.
Causes your periodic damaging abilities that critically hit to restore 1% of your total health.
When you activate Project, you have a 15% chance to project an additional chunk of debris at the target, dealing 50% of normal damage.
When you activate Project, you have a 30% chance to project an additional chunk of debris at the target, dealing 50% of normal damage.
When you activate Project, you have a 45% chance to project an additional chunk of debris at the target, dealing 50% of normal damage.
Reduces the cooldown of Force Stun by 5 seconds. In addition, your Force Lift affects up to 1 within 8 meters of the target.
Reduces the cooldown of Force Stun by 10 seconds. In addition, your Force Lift affects up to 2 within 8 meters of the target.
Telekinetic Throw no longer has a cooldown.

Reduces the pushback suffered while activating Mind Crush and Telekinetic Throw by 25%. In addition, each time your Telekinetic Throw deals damage, you have a 33.334% chance to recover 1% of your total Force.

Reduces the pushback suffered while activating Mind Crush and Telekinetic Throw by 50%. In addition, each time your Telekinetic Throw deals damage, you have a 66.668% chance to recover 1% of your total Force.

Reduces the pushback suffered while activating Mind Crush and Telekinetic Throw by 75%. In addition, each time your Telekinetic Throw deals damage, you have a 100.002% chance to recover 1% of your total Force.
Deals (current weapon) internal damage to up to 3 targets within 8 meters of the targeted area and heals you for ? per affected target.
When your Telekinetic Throw deals damage, you have a 30% chance to cause your next Force-damaging attack with an activation time to activate instantly and deal 20% more damage.
Reduces the damage taken by all periodic effects by 7.5%.
Reduces the damage taken by all periodic effects by 15%.
Lowers the activation time of Force Lift by 50%. In addition, when your Force Lift breaks early from damage, the target is stunned for 1.
Lowers the activation time of Force Lift by 100%. In addition, when your Force Lift breaks early from damage, the target is stunned for 2.
Increases the duration of Mind Crush by 1 seconds.
Increases the duration of Mind Crush by 2 seconds.
Increases the damage dealt by Weaken Mind by 7.5%.
Increases the damage dealt by Weaken Mind by 15%.
Force in Balance now suppresses resistance to the Force, increasing the amount of damage the targets suffer from your next 10 periodic damaging abilities by 20%. Lasts 30 seconds.
Increases the amount of healing generated by Force in Balance and Focused Insight by 10%.
Increases the amount of healing generated by Force in Balance and Focused Insight by 20%.
Increases the critical damage bonus of Force in Balance and your periodic damage abilities by 10%.
Increases the critical damage bonus of Force in Balance and your periodic damage abilities by 20%.
Increases the critical damage bonus of Force in Balance and your periodic damage abilities by 30%.
Weakens the target, freezing it in place for (current weapon) seconds and dealing 2 internal damage over 18 seconds.
